attributes.action: Put the choice of lockdown, tiered or otherwise to a public referendum vote.
attributes.additional_details: The vast majority of the UK disagree with both the tiered and full lockdown restrictions in place, and the statistics that the government is using to claim that restrictions are required.
attributes.background: Any and all current and future removal of civil liberties of UK citizens, such as but not limited to travel, opening businesses and accessing public services; be put to legal voters of the UK to be decided democratically by voting under a Health and Economy referendum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
